content: spring spirits kerchief page 1 of 4 spring spirits kerchief by yulia zakhlebina http //www ravelry com/designers/yulia-zakhlebina this kerchief originated during testing of my spring spirits shawl http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/spring-spirits-shawl when my friend lyubovshalnaya http //www ravelry com/people/lyubovshalnaya had the neat idea to use the shawl charts to make a smaller version with added ties which can be used as a kerchief the kerchief is knitted from the top down and has a triangular shape the beginning of the kerchief is at the center top edge the increases are made on both sides of the central stitch and along the edges of the kerchief there is lace patterning on rs only on ws all stitches are purled including yo the ties are knitted on the 7-sts garter border in garter stitch skill level intermediate lace knitting skills knit purl increases decreases pattern repeats provisional co method the lace pattern is simple but requires attention materials yarn about 25 g of pehorka len naturalniy 85% linen 15% rayon 440 m /100g needles us 2 2 75 mm circular needles notions crochet hook and scrap yarn for provisional cast on knitting stitch markers blocking tools kerchief and photo by lyubovshalnaya two us 2 2 75 mm double pointed needles spring spirits kerchief 2015 ©design by yulia zakhlebina yuliazakh designs@gmail com * free pattern * for the personal use only spring spirits kerchief page 2 of 4 measurements abbreviations top edge 57 cm excluding ties approx approximately pm place marker depth along center stitch 35 cm acc according rs right side gauge is not very important bobble bind off repeat repeat s co cast on st s stitch es k knit ws wrong side instructions p purl yo yarn over beginning provisionally co 7 sts using provisional yarn with a crochet hook make a chain of 9 then with main yarn pick up and knit 7 stitches knitting in the bumps on the back of the chain work 8 row in garter stitch at the end of row 8 turn your work 90º clockwise pick up and knit 3 sts along the longer side of the strip undo the provisional yarn and pick up the seven open stitches onto the left-hand needle and knit them 17 sts on right-hand needle continue your work with 7-sts garter border at the beginning and the end of each row set-up row ws 7-sts garter border pm p1 pm p1 pm p1 pm 7-sts garter border knitting stitch markers are indicating the center stitch and the 7-stitch garter border you can also place markers between pattern repeats body work row 1-28 of the chart a once 65 sts work row 1-36 of the chart c once 153 sts ties in the next row rs start knitting the first tie on the 7 sts of the garter stitch border using two double pointed needles leaving the remaining sts on the main needle spring spirits
